phrs.translation: 名人, 知名人士, 名流, 名人明星
名人名言, 名人名家
人气最旺的欧美女星们, 最旺的欧美女星们
典藏之四, 纪念车辆系列

sentences.sentence: They were entertained by top singers, dancers and celebrities.
sentences.translation: 他们饶有兴趣地看了顶级歌手、舞蹈演员和名流们的演出。

sentences.sentence: Big-name jewellers are battling it out to get celebrities to wear their bling.
sentences.translation: 大牌珠宝商们为了让名人们戴他们的高档首饰正在一争高下。

sentences.sentence: People are very laid-back about spotting celebrities here - nobody wants to look uncool by pointing and shouting.
sentences.translation: 在这里见到明星人们都表现得很放松-没有人指指点点或大声喊叫，这样看起来不酷。
